intro_copy.heading: The Gloucestershire Module
intro_copy.copy:
This module holds 14 interviews with people living and working in Gloucestershire all asked the same questions about work, learning and life.

The Gloucestershire Module is part of a pilot project between Youth Services Team Gloucester and the producer of the Talking Jobs resource.

questions.question: Who are you and what do you do for a living?
Can you describe a normal working day?
What made you want to do this kind of work?
what's the hardest thing about your work?
How does your job impact in your life outside of work?
What are your next steps?
What do you think employers are looking for?
As a child, what did you want to be when you grew up?
Can you tell us about your time at school?
After school what kind of training have you been through?
What didn't they tell you during your training?
Can you tell us something about your family background?
Tell us something about your current life outside of work?
Have you experienced any difficulties in your past?
what have been your most significant turning points?
